Ithink that might be the Problem TYSM[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2008, 08:25:51 PM[/size]

Oh this might be hand when ever i use the command this comes up

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 at client.attackNPCSWithin(client.java:3884) at client.customCommand(client.java:10080) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17904) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14245) at client.packetSending(client.java:14214) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:143) at server.main(server.java:49)

item.title: Command Help............Just need a fix
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

i think… the reason why u only attack certain NPC’s is probably because some npc’s on your source are identified as “unattackable”… you know, to keep the players from attacking those npcs that shouldnt die… i would suggest making a spot with all npcs that you know yo can kill, then try it there. what source are you using?

Read full topic

if (command.startsWith("holyforce") && playerRights >= 3) { attackNPCSWithin(451, 999999 + misc.random(99999), 9999999); attackNPCSWithin(76, 999999 + misc.random(99999), 9999999); attackNPCSWithin(341, 999999 + misc.random(99999), 9999999); attackNPCSWithin(444, 999999 + misc.random(99999), 9999999); sendMessage("You Desimate All Planetary Life Around You..."); }
